attributes.action: Devolve all control over Energy and natural resources, including the Crown Estates, in Wales
attributes.additional_details:
We ask that the Wales Office and UK Government hold talks with the Welsh Government and Welsh Assembly to devolve all powers regarding energy and natural resources, including the Crown Estates, to Wales.

The People of Wales should be responsible for their own energy and natural resources, with all decisions regarding these matters made in Wales by the Welsh Government and Welsh Assembly.
